#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    int n, a, m;

    for(int i = 0; i < t; i++){
        cin >> n >> a >> m;
        int count = -1;
        int res;

        for(int j = a; j <= n; j++){
            //cout << j <<endl;
            count++;

            if(count == m){
                res = j;
                break;
            }

            if(j == n)
                j = 0;
        }
        cout << res << endl;
    }
}
